title: Leading men 's hair coloring brands in the U.S. 2019

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Just For Men and lowest at Brand Grecian 5.
The highest Brand Just For Men has 137.9 more Sales in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand Grecian 5.
Sales in million U.S. dollars at Brand Just For Men is 138.0 , second place is Just For Men Autostop at 27.2, and thirdly is Just For Men Control GX at 18.2.
The highest value 138.0 at Just For Men is almost 6.74 times larger than the average value 20.48.
Summing up the values of all Brands, we get total 204.8.
